wikimedia-copyrightwarning: Fu san sakɛ demesego wa, fun nam mɛ tii bɔ [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use anam bɔ ti ba dikɛ tum], gee fu nam mɛ la fu suure za’a tii ba ta’am dikɛ fu putɛ lagesegɔ bɔ [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0 License] la [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL]. Fu mɛ nam bɔ tii tu’uŋo la bii URL la seke ma’a ti la dɛna fu farabua Creative Commons license wara la puam.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked: '''Fu IP bɔŋa zia la dela [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all wikis]].''' Gua la de ni la $1 ($2). Sɛla n soe la dela ''$3''. * Gua pɔsega: $4 * Gua ba’asegɔ: $5 Fu nananiwa IP bɔŋa zia dela $6. N beleni fu mɛ. pa’asɛ yeledaasi wa za’a fu sokere la za’a ti fu iŋɛ la. Fu san ti’isɛ ti ba tuɛ mɛ gu fu, fu ta’am ɛ lahibaarɛ pa’asɛ kalam [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] tɛngpaberɛ wara puam. San dagena bala, fu ta’am sɔsɛ gua la yele kalam [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff: '''Sɛɛva ayima bii ba zoe zoe ti fu sokere la dikɛ tum dela [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|globally blocked]].''' Sɛla n iŋɛ gua la dela la $1 ($2). Sɛla n soe la dela ''$3''. * Gua pɔsega: $4 * Gua ba’asegɔ: $5 Gua la zia mɔpi deni la $6. N beleni mɛ, pa’asɛ yelesugesi za’a fu eere la ti fu ita la. Fu san ti’isɛ ti ba tue mɛ gu fu, fu ta’am ɛ lahibaarɛ pa’asɛ lalam [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] tɛngpaberɛ wara puam. San dagena bala, fu ta’am sɔsɛ gua la yele kalam [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].
